song.title: Take and eat
song.lyrics:
[C] Take and eat: This is my body. Take and drink: this is my blood. Open your heart! I give my life. I am with you Until the end of time!
[V1] Come dwell in me, as I dwell in you. Just as the Father has loved me, so I love you. No love is greater than a love that gives its all. No longer servants, I call you my friends.
[V2] Ask in my name, what you ask I will do. Then you will know the love my Father has for you. I give my Spirit, He will help you on your way. Do not be troubled. My peace be with you!
[V3] I pray for them so that they may be one. One in us Father, just as you and I are one. May they discover the love you have for me. May they discover your love dwells in them!
